snippet: Lawyers for Keith Olbermann and Current TV are in conversations over a dispute about whether Mr. Olbermann can and will anchor special election coverage.
abstract: Lawyers for Keith Olbermann and Current TV are in conversations over a dispute about whether Mr. Olbermann can and will anchor special election coverage.
lead_paragraph: At this point it could be called Keith Olbermann vs. Current TV.

headline.main: Lawyers Intercede in Rift Between Olbermann and Current
